languages.text: {n}Джай говорит размеренно, с точно выверенной дозой ленцы в голосе, но все ее лицедейство не может скрыть легкой дрожи в голосе. Чего бы Джай ни боялась — именно это выгнало ее с Футфола.{/n}

{n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Джай говорит размеренно, с точно выверенной дозой ленцы в голосе, но все ее лицедейство не может скрыть легкой дрожи в голосе. Чего бы Джай ни боялась — именно это выгнало ее с Футфола.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊的话很有分寸，声音中的懒散也恰到好处，但她的表演无法掩盖她微弱的颤音。虽然不知道婕伊在惧怕什么，但恐怕那就是她离开落脚港的原因。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的话很有分寸，声音中的懒散也恰到好处，但她的表演无法掩盖她微弱的颤音。虽然不知道婕伊在惧怕什么，但恐怕那就是她离开落脚港的原因。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae habla tranquilamente, con la cantidad justa de apatía en la voz, pero ni así consigue ocultar el leve temblor de su voz. No sabes qué es lo que tanto teme Jae, pero tiene que ser lo que la expulsó de Paso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae habla tranquilamente, con la cantidad justa de apatía en la voz, pero ni así consigue ocultar el leve temblor de su voz. No sabes qué es lo que tanto teme Jae, pero tiene que ser lo que la expulsó de Paso.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは声に適度な気だるさを漂わせながら慎重に話していたが、その演技は声の微かな震えを隠すことはできていなかった。ジェが何を恐れているにせよ、それが彼女をフットフォールから遠ざけたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは声に適度な気だるさを漂わせながら慎重に話していたが、その演技は声の微かな震えを隠すことはできていなかった。ジェが何を恐れているにせよ、それが彼女をフットフォールから遠ざけたのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes Ton ist gemessen, mit gerade dem richtigen Maß an Trägheit, doch ihr Schauspiel kann das leichte Zittern in ihrer Stimme nicht verbergen. Wovor Jae sich auch fürchtet, es hat sie von Footfall vertrieben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Ton ist gemessen, mit gerade dem richtigen Maß an Trägheit, doch ihr Schauspiel kann das leichte Zittern in ihrer Stimme nicht verbergen. Wovor Jae sich auch fürchtet, es hat sie von Footfall vertrieben.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae parle de façon mesurée, sur un ton juste assez indolent pour paraître convaincant, mais vous décelez tout de même un léger tremblement dans sa voix. Elle a peur de quelque chose, et c'est ça qui l'a poussée à quitter Castel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae parle de façon mesurée, sur un ton juste assez indolent pour paraître convaincant, mais vous décelez tout de même un léger tremblement dans sa voix. Elle a peur de quelque chose, et c'est ça qui l'a poussée à quitter Castel.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, ölçüp biçerek konuşuyor. Sesinde hassasiyetle ayarlanmış bir tembellik olsa bu performans, sesindeki hafif titremeyi gizlemeye yetmiyor. Jae, Binliman'dan ayrılmasına neden olan şeyden korkuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks measuredly, with just the right amount of laziness in her voice, but her performance cannot conceal the slight tremble in her voice. Whatever Jae is afraid of, that is what drove her off Footfall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ölçüp biçerek konuşuyor. Sesinde tam doğru ölçüde bir tembellik var ama bu performansı, sesindeki hafif titremeyi gizleyemiyor. Jae, Binliman'dan ayrılmasına neden olan şeyden korkuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
